Title: Log Date 7 15 2
Writer: Rebecca Sugar (creator), Hilary Florido, Lauren Zuke, Matt Burnett (story), Ben Levin (story), Rebecca Sugar (story), Ian Jones-Quartey (story), Kat Morris (story)
Actors: Zach Callison, Michaela Dietz, Estelle, Deedee Magno
Plot: Whilst Peridot is in turmoil over her actions, Steven listens to her audio diary and learns how she and Garnet learned to get along during her time at the barn, despite their radical differences.
